about_the_game:
WHAT IS IT?

Dungeons & Keyboards is a fun and engaging way to sharpen and show off your keyboard typing skills. How far will your typing skills take you?

HOW TO PLAY?

  • Grab your favourite keyboard
  • Lube those keyboard switches (OPTIONAL)
  • Start typing away!

    PRO TIP: Typing extra fast causes a CRITICAL HIT for extra damage but don't go getting too greedy as any typo and the enemy won't hesitate to pounce!

FEATURES:

  • Randomized word list that gets tougher the higher you climb
  • Level up, earn coins & ancient relics to upgrade your offensive and defensive capabilities to climb even further
  • Choose between three powerful spells to cast during your climb
  • Mix up your typing gameplay even more with Augmentations but remember there’s no reward without risk
  • Compete against friends, family or sworn enemies on the global leaderboards
  • Infinite floors of enemies with 5 flavourful themed levels
  • Does having items, spells, upgrades and more than 1 HP sound too easy for you? Why not try Hardcore Mode?

OK THAT'S COOL BUT HOW DO I FLEX ON MY FRIENDS?

Playing with an online connection will automatically upload your highest reached floor to Steam's global leaderboard*


*leaderboard functionality requires an internet connection, the rest of the game can be enjoyed completely off the grid

[/url

highlighted.name: Nothing More Than a Bony Bat?
ALL YOUR KEYBOARDS BELONG TO US
Why Waste Time Say Lot Word...

detailed_description:
WHAT IS IT?

Dungeons & Keyboards is a fun and engaging way to sharpen and show off your keyboard typing skills. How far will your typing skills take you?

HOW TO PLAY?

  • Grab your favourite keyboard
  • Lube those keyboard switches (OPTIONAL)
  • Start typing away!

    PRO TIP: Typing extra fast causes a CRITICAL HIT for extra damage but don't go getting too greedy as any typo and the enemy won't hesitate to pounce!

FEATURES:

  • Randomized word list that gets tougher the higher you climb
  • Level up, earn coins & ancient relics to upgrade your offensive and defensive capabilities to climb even further
  • Choose between three powerful spells to cast during your climb
  • Mix up your typing gameplay even more with Augmentations but remember there’s no reward without risk
  • Compete against friends, family or sworn enemies on the global leaderboards
  • Infinite floors of enemies with 5 flavourful themed levels
  • Does having items, spells, upgrades and more than 1 HP sound too easy for you? Why not try Hardcore Mode?

OK THAT'S COOL BUT HOW DO I FLEX ON MY FRIENDS?

Playing with an online connection will automatically upload your highest reached floor to Steam's global leaderboard*

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with OpenGL 2.0 support

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with OpenGL 2.0 support

name: Dungeons & Keyboards

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or later
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with OpenGL 2.0 support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Ready your typing skills and defeat the quirky enemies of the Tower of Verbum. Collect coins, relics, and experience to buy items, assign stats and unlock permanent upgrades. How far will your typing skills take you?
